responses: Hello! How can I assist you with your health today?
Goodbye! Take care of your health.

For headaches, try resting in a dark room, staying hydrated, and taking over-the-counter pain relievers as directed. If your headache is severe or persists, consider consulting a healthcare professional.

For fever, make sure to stay hydrated, get plenty of rest, and take fever reducers like acetaminophen if needed. If your fever is very high (over 103°F/39.4°C) or lasts more than three days, please seek medical attention.

For a cold, get plenty of rest, stay hydrated, and consider over-the-counter cold medications for symptom relief. Warm liquids and throat lozenges may help with a sore throat. If symptoms worsen or last more than 10 days, consult a healthcare professional.
